short_description: ub finance is a bank/atm based in colombo, sri lanka.
long_description: ub finance plc, a financial institution borne from the strategic collaboration between union bank of colombo plc, sri lanka's premier financial institution, and an esteemed international strategic investment partner. this partnership, marked by a recent capital infusion of rs 1.98 billion, establishes ub finance as one of the highest-capitalised finance companies in sri lanka's private sector. ub finance plc boasts an impressive fitch rating of [sl]bb with a positive outlook, underscoring its dedication to fostering sustainable and mutually beneficial partnerships for all stakeholders. with a core mission to deliver unique economic and social value to all sri lankans, ub finance is committed to nurturing its clients' financial aspirations while upholding the cherished sri lankan values of tradition and auspiciousness. notably, ub finance has made significant strides in social responsibility, extending assistance to thousands of customers affected by the ceylinco regime's collapse, underscoring its commitment to social accountability and economic viability. licensed by the central bank of sri lanka, ub finance plc is committed to delivering financial services built on integrity and empowerment. its offerings encompass a comprehensive range of financial services, including fixed deposits, savings, real estate, leasing, hire purchase, loans factoring, and pawning solutions.
business_tags: leasing deals | hire purchase loan | financial services | real estate leases | fixed deposits
generated_description: ub finance plc is a financial institution in sri lanka, established through a strategic collaboration between union bank of colombo plc and an international investment partner. with a recent capital infusion of rs 1.98 billion, ub finance is one of the highest-capitalised finance companies in the country's private sector. it has a strong fitch rating of [sl]bb with a positive outlook, reflecting its commitment to sustainable partnerships. ub financial aims to provide economic and social value to all sri lankans and uphold sri lankan values of tradition and auspiciousness. the company is licensed by the central bank of sri lanka and offers a wide range of financial services, including fixed deposits, savings, real estate, leasing, hire purchase, loans factoring, and pawning solutions. uub finance has also demonstrated a strong commitment to social responsibility, assisting customers affected by the ceylinco regime's collapse.
